0.4.name: wordpress/google-analytics-for-anonymous-users
0.4.description:
This plugin helps you insert Google Analytics code into your theme, but ONLY ENABLED FOR NOT-LOGGED-IN USERS. It is of great use if you are worring about Google's tracking of your own visits. So as long as you make sure you visit your own site as a logged-in user (admin, editor, etc), it will be just fine.

Please note that if your wordpress blog is open for registeration, this plugin may result in a error of stat beacuse all logged in users will not be tracked.

Chinese:

这个插件帮助你在主题中插入 Google Analytics 统计代码，并且只对匿名访问者有效——登陆用户的访问不会被统计。这个插件可以避免 Google 统计网站所有者自己对网站的访问，只要你确保访问网站时是登陆状态即可。

请注意如果你的网站开放注册，那么可能不适用本插件。
